*Regarding Neidrahu* "What happened next was a repeat of the events of the war with Beleth. Those killed by an undead were ressurected and enlisted in Lidia's force. The higher-level vassals of the Hellmann family became vampires, or high level undeads. They possessed indescribable power!%% It semmed the battke was over, until..."%% [Quest _022_TragedyInVonHellmannForest 31328-16.htm|Next page]
